<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ProblemUtil</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description>Client callable utilities for Problem Management.  Overwrite functions defined in ProblemUtilSNC, by defining the same function in this script include.</description> <name>ProblemUtil</name> <script><![CDATA[var ProblemUtil = Class.create(); ProblemUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(ProblemUtilSNC, {
initialize: function(request, responseXML, gc) { ProblemUtilSNC.prototype.initialize.call(this, request, responseXML, gc); },
type: 'ProblemUtil' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-11-04 12:05:10</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4b765483c3322200b6dcdfdc64d3aecd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ProblemUtil</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Problem Management Best Practice - Jakarta" source="com.snc.best_practice.problem.jakarta">9c648d0f6da620100acb70b353433020</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4b765483c3322200b6dcdfdc64d3aecd</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-11-11 09:40:46</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>257</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
